languages.text: {n}Работяга мрачно скалится на побледневшего блюстителя.{/n} "Доволен? Еще свидимся, как раны залижу. Посмотрим, как ты без дубинки запоешь".
{n}The worker snarls at the enforcer, who has suddenly gone pale.{/n} "Didn't expect that, now did you? Once my back stops hurting... we'll see how brave you are without your baton."
languages.original_text: {n}Работяга мрачно скалится на побледневшего блюстителя.{/n} "Доволен? Еще свидимся, как раны залижу. Посмотрим, как ты без дубинки запоешь".

traits.locale_text: {n}The worker snarls at the enforcer, who has suddenly gone pale.{/n} "Didn't expect that, now, did you? Once my back stops hurting... we'll see how brave you are without your baton."

{n}The worker snarls at the enforcer, who has suddenly gone pale.{/n} "Didn't expect that, now did you? Once my back stops hurting... we'll see how brave you are without your baton."

languages.text: {n}El trabajador masculla unas palabras al guardia, que se ha quedado pálido:{/n} «Esa no te la esperabas, ¿eh? En cuanto me deje de doler la espalda... veremos lo valiente que eres sin tu porra».
languages.original_text: {n}The worker snarls at the enforcer, who has suddenly gone pale.{/n} "Didn't expect that, now did you? Once my back stops hurting... we'll see how brave you are without your baton."

traits.locale_text: {n}El trabajador masculla unas palabras al guardia, que se ha quedado pálido:{/n} «Esa no te la esperabas, ¿eh? En cuanto me deje de doler la espalda... veremos lo valiente que eres sin tu porra».

languages.text: {n}突然青ざめた執行官に、労働者が唸る。{/n} 「予想外でしょう？自分の背中が痛くなくなったら…警棒なしのあなたがどれだけ勇気があるか、見てあげます」
languages.original_text: {n}The worker snarls at the enforcer, who has suddenly gone pale.{/n} "Didn't expect that, now did you? Once my back stops hurting... we'll see how brave you are without your baton."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然青ざめた執行官に、労働者が唸る。{/n} 「予想外でしょう？自分の背中が痛くなくなったら…警棒なしのあなたがどれだけ勇気があるか、見てあげます」

languages.text: {n}执法者霎时间变得脸色惨白，那个工人对他咆哮起来。{/n}“你没想到会变成这个样子，是吧？等我的后背不疼之后……咱们可以看看失去了警棍之后，你还有什么能耐。”
languages.original_text: {n}The worker snarls at the enforcer, who has suddenly gone pale.{/n} "Didn't expect that, now did you? Once my back stops hurting... we'll see how brave you are without your baton."

traits.locale_text: {n}执法者霎时间变得脸色惨白，那个工人对他咆哮起来。{/n}“你没想到会变成这个样子，是吧？等我的后背不疼之后……咱们可以看看失去了警棍之后，你还有什么能耐。”

languages.text: {n}Der Arbeiter faucht den Enforcer an, der plötzlich erbleicht.{/n} "Das hattet Ihr nicht erwartet, was? Sobald mein Rücken nicht mehr schmerzt ... werden wir sehen, wie mutig Ihr ohne Euren Stock seid."
languages.original_text: {n}The worker snarls at the enforcer, who has suddenly gone pale.{/n} "Didn't expect that, now did you? Once my back stops hurting... we'll see how brave you are without your baton."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Arbeiter faucht den Enforcer an, der plötzlich erbleicht.{/n} "Das hattet Ihr nicht erwartet, was? Sobald mein Rücken nicht mehr schmerzt ... werden wir sehen, wie mutig Ihr ohne Euren Stock seid."

languages.text: {n}L'ouvrier se met à aboyer contre le prévôt, qui affiche subitement une pâleur mortelle.{/n} « Tu t'attendais pas à ça, hein ? Dès que mon dos ira mieux... on verra comment tu t'en sors sans ta matraque. »
languages.original_text: {n}The worker snarls at the enforcer, who has suddenly gone pale.{/n} "Didn't expect that, now did you? Once my back stops hurting... we'll see how brave you are without your baton."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'ouvrier se met à aboyer contre le prévôt, qui affiche subitement une pâleur mortelle.{/n} « Tu t'attendais pas à ça, hein ? Dès que mon dos ira mieux... on verra comment tu t'en sors sans ta matraque. »

languages.text: {n}İşçi, aniden beti benzi atan infazcıya hırlıyor.{/n} "Bunu beklemiyordun, değil mi? Sırtımın ağrısı bir kesilsin de... Copun olmadan ne kadar cesur olduğunu göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: {n}The worker snarls at the enforcer, who has suddenly gone pale.{/n} "Didn't expect that, now did you? Once my back stops hurting... we'll see how brave you are without your baton."
